name: Glad Osondu
text: They satisfied me. I searched for the best service centre in abuja, i found them in google. They repaired my range rover evoque excellently. I became impressed by the way they handled my troubled car.

name: Belinda Samama
text: After almost been frustrated by mechanics that claimed to be experts. My gear box is working perfectly now, but not until I gave my last try to AutoFixer Limited. I regretted wasting so much before I was referred there but all the same, I am glad my car is working well as supposed

name: Kazeem Ahmed
text: I am so glad that I have a personal mechanic. It gives me joy and confident knowing my vehicles are safe and in good hands. Thanks Mr Idowu and co.
